headline: Fund Opposing DEI-Hiring Goals Targets Nike, Kraft and Autodesk
summary: (Bloomberg) -- A new investment fund that plans to oppose corporate DEI hiring goals is taking aim at Nike Inc., Kraft Heinz Co. and Autodesk Inc.Most Read from BloombergHow California Sees the World, and ItselfHong Kong's Expat Party Hub Reshaped by Chinese InfluxLondon’s Tube Fares Are Set to Rise by 4.6% Next YearAzoria Partners’ fund says it will avoid S&P 500 companies with specific diversity, equity and inclusion hiring objectives when it opens in March. Nike, Kraft Heinz and Autodesk fall

headline: Mairs & Power Growth Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: The Mairs & Power Growth Fund continued its positive performance ending the third quarter up 19.01% year-to-date (YTD). Click here to read the full commentary.
